]0;shivam@sjsu:~/worksheet5[shivam@sjsu worksheet5]$ mkdir CUSTOMERS
]0;shivam@sjsu:~/worksheet5[shivam@sjsu worksheet5]$ awk -F "\t" '{print $2}' amazon_reviews_us_Books_v1_02.tsv | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | head --n 1000 | awk -F " " '{print $2}' > top1000
]0;shivam@sjsu:~/worksheet5[shivam@sjsu worksheet5]$ cat top1000 | while read line ; do grep -h $line amazon_reviews_us_Books_v1_02.tsv > CUSTOMERS//$line.txt ;
>  done
